channel.title: story on intimacy of my thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in story on intimacy of my thoughts

item.title: Sonnie
item.description: Sonnie, a young, strong and beautiful woman from Penang, currently studying in the UK to become a psychologist. Her alpha-like attitude and knowledge doesn’t speak of her age, and bargaining skills are next to nothing. She’s an adventurer at heart, but most of all, she can easily talk to anyone, and you can tell she’s listening.

item.title: Pete
item.description: Pete is his name. He’s the first person I asked if it’s okay to take a photo of him. I’m glad he said, “yes.” He used to be a nurse in London. Behind those fearless eyes is a gentle person with a lot of hard-earned experiences. One day, he decided to leave the city for various reasons, but one of those is that he couldn’t get any help that he needed.
